summary: Ecosystem explores the intricate web of interactions within biological environments and how these concepts translate to modern organizational structures. It delves into non-hierarchical, decentralized models inspired by natural ecosystems. The term highlights the importance of innovative frameworks and tools necessary for resilient and adaptable organizations. Upcoming content promises insights into internet fragmentation and pioneering practices shaping today's ecosystems.
excerpt: The term ecosystem has evolved from biological roots to describe innovative, non-hierarchical structures in contemporary organizations, necessitating new conceptual models and tools.
